text: Kangaroo is a 1952 American Australian western movie directed by Lewis Milestone and stars Maureen O'Hara, Peter Lawford, Finlay Currie, Richard Boone. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was remade as The Jackals in 1967. ==Other websites== * * Category:1952 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Australian Western (genre) movies Category:Movies set in Australia Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:Movies set in the 1900s Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Kangaroo (1952 movie)
